data.oai_dc:dc: This file contains the observed network values for each individual in each period. The data refer to their treatment (C = undisturbed, T = disturbed), Period 1 = time 1 and 2 = time 2. The tub column refers to the population the individuals were placed in. Elytra is in millimeters and represents the measurement from the caudal end of the elytra to the scutellum. All network metrics were calculated using the R package t-net with strength assigned an alpha of 0.5.
